BR_text.BRdescription:
this file https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/python/mxnet/contrib/tensorboard.py does not work any more,
 because new tensorboard does not have a Class named SummaryWrite in writer.py
 how could I use tensorboard now?

comments_0.comment_text:
It's not hard to handle the tensorboard summary with python code,  <denchmark-link:http://shuokay.com/deeplabv3/>here</denchmark-link>
  is an example:
 train_writer = SummaryWriter(cfg.train_logdir)
 eval_writer = SummaryWriter(cfg.eval_logdir)
 train_writer.add_scalar("loss", train_mloss, count)
 train_writer.add_scalar("miou", train_miou, count)
 eval_writer.add_scalar("loss", eval_mloss, count)
 eval_writer.add_scalar("miou", eval_miou, count)

comments_1.comment_text: tensorboard has been changed to refer to the TensorFlow's TensorBoard in PyPI.

comments_3.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/qingzhouzhen>@qingzhouzhen</denchmark-link>
  Can this issue be closed now since <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/11426>#11426</denchmark-link>
  has been merged?
